results.title: Quality Management Officer

results.description: We are looking for a qualified Control Systems / Mechatronics Developer. The goals of this person would be to support the development of BigRep Control Software. We currently have control systems written in C/C++ based on Smoothieware, as well as control systems based on Siemens Sinumerik technology. This job is centered on designing and implementing new software to use new sensors or control systems, as well as developing tests and designs for new control electronics. Much of the work will be …

results.description: You will lead the development of the scientific test data needed for ground segment and system testing.
